amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds in contravention of the War Powers Resolution.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds in contravention of the War Powers Resolution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sherman amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 248 - 163 (Roll no. 415).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Sherman.
